title: German Police Raid Antivaccine Extremists Suspected of Plot to Kill Politician
sub_head: Officials are growing increasingly concerned about the radicalization of Covid-19 skeptics as the country considers a general vaccine mandate
body:
BERLIN—German special police forces carried out raids in the country’s South-East targeting a network suspected of conspiring to murder local politicians for their role in implementing Covid-19 restrictions, police said on Wednesday.
The news comes as German officials are growing worried about the radicalization of some antivaccine militants as the country edges toward a general Covid-19 vaccine mandate that could come early next year.
